vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἐμβρῑμ-άομαι
(active only in [Refs 5th c.AD+], with aorist middle et passive, snort in, ἵππους ἐν ἀμπυκτῆρσιν ἐμβριμωμένας, of horses, [Refs 4th c.BC+]
__2 of persons, to be deeply moved, τῷ πνεύματι, ἐν ἑαυτῷ, [NT]
__II admonish urgently, rebuke, [NT+5th c.BC+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: to warn sternly, rebuke harshly; to be deeply moved
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to warn sternly, rebuke harshly; to be deeply moved
Attic spelling, ejmbrimovomai, to be greatly agitated, Jn. 11:33, 38; to charge or forbid sternly or vehemently, Mt. 9:30; Mk. 1:43; to express indignation, to censure, rebuke Mk. 14:5*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hablar severamente a ; criticar duramente ; estar profundamente conmovido (JN.11:33,38)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: nghiêm cấm; nghiêm nghị căn dặn
